description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in solverwp.Com Eleblog – Elementor Blog And Magazine Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Eleblog – Elementor Blog And Magazine Addons: from n/a through 1.8.

product.name: Eleblog – Elementor Blog And Magazine Addons
